title: Your boy lord apex has began a twitch channel. crowofjustice
body:
yep, I finally am a twitch streamer, and I am ready to grant content. For later notice, the ping on league I get while streaming is extremely poor, won't go lower than 600. Eventually, I will eventually be getting a capture card to perform streams on console games like dark souls, bloodborne, and smash ultimate, hopefully those mentioned will perform better on console games. Anyway do not forget to follow my new channel, crowofjustice.

I N C O M I N G C O N T E N T

replies.body: Normally you're supposed to also post a link to your twitch channel.
Did you figure out the facecam? Got everything set up?
I am not doing a facecam YET. when I get 300 followers, I will consider it.
